channel.title: &tiab
channel.description:
So anyways, I felt inspired and wanted to work on a template. Need some C&C, etc.
http://www.punjuice.org/attempt2.html
Oh yeah, and I need some help on why the bottom part wont fucking center. (and I know my code is pretty messy, etc.)

item.title: &tiab
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:34, topic:246857”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=325824.msg2559730#msg2559730 date=1228080759]

And that looks a lot better.

Man, do you not learn? There’s 2 modify buttons buttons on your post, they’re there for a reason.

Dont have to, it combines my post for me, it it really going to kill you to like at the line, im sorry. I don’t care.

Don’t get pissy that his work is better then yours.

lol, first thats an opinion, and do you even know how to design a website lmao. his work could be better than mine, buts hes done this more than I have.
[/quote]

Not really, this is my 3rd try at coding, 1st time doing it basically all on my own.[/quote]
I meant graphic design I do like this site though and im sorry for being suck a dick earlier.

Read full topic

item.title: &tiab
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

I think its more of opinion than anything[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 09:04:12 am[/size][hr][quote=“FastBawlz, post:24, topic:246857”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=325824.msg2558151#msg2558151 date=1228017981]
Anways im not coming back here anymore, im going to find a real webdeisgn site “graphics master” makes me laugh when he cant even compress a file write I know he fails.
[/quote]

Heh, you’re silly.

The only reason it’s fucked up on punjuice.org is sort of a long story.

Here’s the short version:
I lose the password to the CP of punjuice.org
I make get some freehostia hosting just to put on some website attempts
I get the password to punjuice.org from my friend, I upload the shit back.
Soooo, I had to re-download/upload the banners, website, etc. which caused the banner to look shitty.
I never went back on it again, nor did I even notice the JPEG compression, and now that I notice it, I still don’t give a shit because it’s not like I’m releasing this template out to public or selling it, I was just fucking around.

http://bawl.freehostia.com/attempt2.html
^See, it’s perfectly fine there.

No I dont target anyone below ie6 even thought it does support pngs just not transparent which Is why I succeed and this fkn design fails.

Someone is a bit butthurt, eh?

Off-topic:
And then all the rest of the staff yells at me because I mistreat moparscapers, it’s not my fault they’re fucking cocky and at the same time, idiots.[/quote]

And that looks a lot better.

Read full topic

The only reason it’s fucked up on punjuice.org is sort of a long story.

Here’s the short version:
I lose the password to the CP of punjuice.org
I make get some freehostia hosting just to put on some website attempts
I get the password to punjuice.org from my friend, I upload the shit back.
Soooo, I had to re-download/upload the banners, website, etc. which caused the banner to look shitty.

No I dont target anyone below ie6 even thought it does support pngs just not transparent which Is [b]why I succeed[/b] and [b]this fkn design fails.[/b]

item.title: &tiab
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:20, topic:246857”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=325824.msg2557921#msg2557921 date=1228008998]

Plenty large

I guess you haven’t realized that .PNGs normally are a lot larger than JPEGs and therefore normally not used for websites.

yeah I know that they are bigger, but its just easier for me not worry about switching between gif and jpeg all the time, I usually don’t target people using anything less than dsl.
[/quote]

And you probably don’t target your sites to anyone using IE7 or below either, which is probably why you wont get anywhere with designing websites.[/quote]

No I dont target anyone below ie6 even thought it does support pngs just not transparent which Is why I succeed and this fkn design fails.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2008, 10:07:29 pm[/size][hr]Anways im not coming back here anymore, im going to find a real webdeisgn site “graphics master” makes me laugh when he cant even compress a file write I know he fails.
